summary: This adds an Argonian mage, a archer Kahjit and a Nord conjurer along with a 2handed Nord
descriptionHtml:
They are all found in the Sleeping Giant Inn and each have their own abilities and traits. You have a choice of a variety of 4 different followers and 3 races. Hope you enjoy.

UPDATE*
Makes the followers scale to the level of the player(I thought they were a little to strong).
Also removes Tahzeymahs Meteor shout and lowers his dragon fire breath power. YOU MUST DELETE OLD FILES BEFORE DOWNLOADING!!!

Tahzeymah:
Race:Argonian     Class:Pyromancer
Level:Lvl of player             WeaponDaedric War Axe
List of Spells:      Armor:Shrouded Robes
Flame Thrall,Fire Storm,Incinerate,
Wall of Flames, Alduin Fire Stormcall and DragonFireBreath

Kuvarack:
Race:Khajit     Class:Archer
Level:Lvl of player         Weapon:Dwarven Bow,Daedric Arrows
Armor:Forsworn Armor

Burah:
Race:Nord       Class:2Handed
Level:Lvl of player           Weapon:Steel Warhammer,SteelBattle Axe, SteelGreatsword
Armor:Drauger Armor(Acient Nord Armor)

Elsalia:
Race:Nord     Class:Conjuration
Level:Lvl of player            Weapon:Ebony Dagger
List of Spells:      Armor:Noctural Robes
Conjure, Familiar,Storm Atronach,Frost Atronach,Flame Atronach
Dremora Lord, Dragon Priest
author: CHEIMON
